firstNightReminder: During Demon info, show the Demon three in-play characters instead of their normal bluffs.
name: Insider
ability: The Demon's bluffs are in-play characters.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Tattletale two character tokens, one in-play and one not in-play. (zzz)
name: Tattletale
ability: You start knowing a pair of characters, exactly one of which is in-play.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Archivist any not in-play character token. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Archivist any not in-play character token. (zzz)
name: Archivist
ability: Each night, learn a not-in-play character.

firstNightReminder: Mark the Itinerant with any of its markers. ‚óØ üëÅ Point to a player whose character matches the character type currently marking the Itinerant. (zzz) Advance the Itinerant's marker to the next marker in the cycle. ‚óØ
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Point to a player whose character matches the character type currently marking the Itinerant. (zzz) Advance the Itinerant's marker to the next marker in the cycle. ‚óØ
name: Itinerant
ability: Each night, learn a player who's next in this cycle: Townsfolk, Outsider, Minion, starting with any of them. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If a player died tonight: üëÅ Point to a player who died tonight. Point to the category of the pointed-to character on the Witness' character sheet. (zzz)
name: Witness
ability: Each night*, learn what type of character killed a particular player tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Celebrity points to a player. (zzz) If that player is the Demon, the Celebrity dies ‚óØ and no one else can die tonight. ‚óØ
name: Celebrity
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if you chose the Demon, you (and you alone) die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Stunt Double points to a player. (zzz) Tonight, if that player dies, the Stunt Double dies instead ‚óØ. (zzz) üëÅ Wake the chosen player. Show the "This player selected you" card, then the Stunt Double token. (zzz)
name: Stunt Double
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they die tonight, you die instead & they learn that you protected them.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Matchmaker may point to 2 alive players. (zzz) If the players are of different alignments, one of them dies. ‚óØ
name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night*, you may choose 2 alive players (not yourself): if they differ in alignment, one of them (not a Demon) dies.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Sleuth points to any number of players. (zzz) If more than 1 of them is evil, the Sleuth dies. ‚óØ
name: Sleuth
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players: if more than 1 is evil, you die.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Reveler was nominated today: üëÅ The Reveler points to 3 players. (zzz) Those players are drunk. ‚óØ
name: Reveler
ability: Each night*, if you were nominated by another player today, you may choose 3 alive players: they are drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Inquisitor's target did not respond truthfully today: the target dies. ‚óØ
name: Inquisitor
ability: Once per game, in day, publicly ask someone a yes/no question. Tonight they die unless they replied truthfully (or are a Demon).

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Lightning Rod voted for all of today's nominations: place the "Safe" markers. ‚óØ
name: Lightning Rod
ability: Your alive neighbors cannot die at night if you voted for every nomination today (at least 1).

name: Trapezist
ability: If you are the only alive player of your alignment, your team wins.

name: Snakebite
ability: You have a Townsfolk ability and think you are that Townsfolk. A good player among those chosen with your ability dies.

otherNightReminder: Ôºü If the Pariah was executed today and 1 evil player voted: üëÅ Show the "You are" card, then the thumb-down "evil" sign. (zzz)
name: Pariah
ability: If you are executed and exactly 1 evil player voted, you become evil.

name: Rabble-rouser
ability: If a player would choose one of your neighbors with their ability, they might choose you instead.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Apothecary died tonight: ensure that the "Townsfolk Poisoned" marker is placed in the Grimoire. ‚óØ
name: Apothecary
ability: If you die, Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If a good player chose the Gorgon tonight: double check that they are dead. ‚óØ
name: Gorgon
ability: If a good player chooses you with their ability at night, they die.

firstNightReminder: Place the "Webbed" marker on the Tarantella's left Townsfolk neighbor. ‚óØ
otherNightReminder: Remove the "Poisoned" markers, if any. ‚óØ
name: Tarantella
ability: Your left Townsfolk neighbor is poisoned. Other Townsfolk for whom you vote or vote for you are poisoned until dawn.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Cultist nods "yes" or shakes "no": if "yes", swap the Cultist and Demon character tokens. Swap the Demon token with any not in-play Demon token. Show the "You are" card, then the new Demon token. (zzz) üëÅ Wake the new Cultist. Show the "You are" card, then the Cultist token. (zzz)
name: Cultist
ability: Each night*, you may choose that the Demon dies & becomes a Cultist. If you do, you become a not in-play Demon.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Omen was "mad" about a particular fact today: you may make that fact true.
name: Omen
ability: Each night*, something you were "mad" about today might come true.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Rex has been nominated this game: üëÅ the Rex points to 2 players. Otherwise: the Rex points to a player. (zzz) The chosen player(s) die. ‚óØ
name: Rex
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you have been nominated this game, choose 2 players tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Spree points to a player and potentially a character. If they pointed to the player's character, the chosen player dies ‚óØ and you repeat this ability from the beginning. If they pointed to any other character, nothing happens. If they didn't point to a character, the chosen player dies. ‚óØ (zzz)
name: Spree
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may also guess their character: repeat this ability if right; otherwise, they live.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz) ‚óØ
otherNightReminder: If the marked player is dead: their alive good neighbors die ‚óØ. Otherwise: the marked player dies. üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz) ‚óØ
name: Deathgripp
ability: Each night, choose an alive player. If the player you chose last night is alive, they die. If not, their alive good neighbors die.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Veni Vidi Vici points to a player. (zzz) That player dies. ‚óØ
name: Veni Vidi Vici
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way and no Outsiders live, evil wins instead. [3 Outsiders]
